dcterms:description: 3RScan is a large-scale indoor dataset with approximately 1.4k real 3D scans, which does not contain canonical poses for objects, essential for learning object pose and shape.
dcterms:title: 3RScan

dcterms:creator: Johanna Wald
Helisa Dhamo
Nassir Navab
Federico Tombari
dcterms:description: 3DSSG is a large-scale real 3D dataset based on 3RScan that contains semantic scene graphs, enabling the evaluation of scene generation and manipulation.
dcterms:title: 3DSSG

dcterms:description: ShapeNet is an information-rich 3D model repository that provides a large collection of 3D shapes for various applications in computer vision and graphics.
dcterms:title: ShapeNet

dcterms:description: Visual Genome is a dataset that connects language and vision using crowdsourced dense image annotations, providing a rich source of information for various vision tasks.
dcterms:title: Visual Genome
